CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(S_View1__c),'Garden View',RW_Project__r.S_View1_PLC__c, 'Park View', RW_Project__r.S_View2_PLC__c, 'Sea View', RW_Project__r.S_View3_PLC__c,0) + CASE(TEXT(S_View_2__c),'Garden View',RW_Project__r.S_View1_PLC__c, 'Park View', RW_Project__r.S_View2_PLC__c, 'Sea View', RW_Project__r.S_View3_PLC__c,0) + CASE(TEXT(S_View_3__c),'Garden View',RW_Project__r.S_View1_PLC__c, 'Park View', RW_Project__r.S_View2_PLC__c, 'Sea View', RW_Project__r.S_View3_PLC__c,0)
CustomField.label: PLC Total
